subject: Self Care
title: Redefining Success
description: Learn Redefining Success in one minute.

hook.text: He hit every career goal by 40. Corner office, high salary, respect. He also had insomnia, anxiety, and no friends.

buildup.text: Society's definition of success often excludes health, relationships, and inner peace. The metrics are incomplete.

discovery.text: Arianna Huffington calls it the third metric: beyond money and power, there's well-being, wisdom, and wonder.

twist.text: Redefining success feels like giving up to high achievers. It's actually upgrading â€” from narrow to whole-life success.

climax.text: Write your personal definition of success. Include health, rest, joy, and connection. Then build your life around it.

punchline.text: Redefine success to include well-being. Then pursue it fully.

quiz.question: What is Arianna Huffington's 'third metric' of success?
options: Well-being, wisdom, and wonder beyond money and power
